title: Arkadi  Monastery
text: The Arkadi Monastery is an Eastern Orthodox monastery, situated on a fertile plateau 23 km to the southeast of Rethymnon.

title: Preveli Beach
text: Preveli Beach, Finikodaso is a beach located in the municipality of Agios Vasilios in the Rethymno

title: Triopetra Beach
text: Triopetrabeach owes its name to the three imposing rocks found in its waters. It is located 52 km south of Rethymno town and 13 km north of Akoumia village.

title: Old town Rethymno
text: The old town in Rethymno it is located in the heart of today's Rethymno and combines the oriental appearance of the Ottoman Empire with the Western architectural style of the Renaissance.

title: The Kourtaliotiko Gorge
text: Kourtaliotiko, is on the southern side of the western part of the island of Rethymno. It is situated where the Kourtaliotiko River flows southwards between the mountains of Kouroupa and Xiron.

title: Fortezza
text: The Fortezza is the citadel of the city of Rethymno in Crete, Greece. It was built by the Venetians in the 16th century.
